column4: Im having trouble getting my linksys wrt54g wireless router to recognize multiple ubuntu computers. It seems that the default gateway for my router isnt the same as from out of box. any ideas anyone?
Im having trouble getting my linksys wrt54g wireless router to recognize multiple ubuntu computers. It seems that the default gateway for my router isnt the same as from out of box. any ideas anyone?
how do i find the ip address of my router. not the modem but the router itself. when i do ip search i only get my isp asigned ip not my router's.
- check under the router, it should be something like 192.168.1.1
